text: Mark Barry (born 13 May 1964) is a British former cyclist. ==Cycling career== He competed in the sprint and 1000m time trial events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. He represented England in the match sprint and time trial events, at the 1982 Commonwealth Games in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. Barry was twice British track champion, winning the British National Individual Sprint Championships in 1982 and 1983. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:English male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Great Britain Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1982 Commonwealth Games Category:Sportspeople from Leeds
title: Mark Barry (cyclist)
